name: weather-mcp-server
description: Provides real-time and forecast weather updates using Open-Meteo API.

tools.name: get_weather_by_city
tools.description: Get current weather for a given city.

tools.name: get_weather_by_coordinates
tools.description: Get detailed weather by latitude and longitude.

tools.name: get_forecast
tools.description: Get a 5-day weather forecast for a city.
